summary: Makes mudcrabs more challenging and deadly!
descriptionHtml:
[center]This mod does NOT use scripts!
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/41354-4-1377928198.png[/img][/center]
The mudcrabs are now tired of being pushed around as laughing stock in Skyrim.
Now every encounter with a mudcrab can cause serious consequences! Be careful...

*All mudcrabs are now levelled
*Increased Attack damage, Health and stamina regen
*new abilities are added
*new high-level mudcrabs with bigger size and buffs
*and much more!

Changes in Version 1.1
*Mudcrabs now have smarter A.I.
*Mudcrabs are now more agile
*More high-level mudcrabs - level 75 mudcrabs will level with your charcter without limit
*increased the value of mudcrab chitin to compensate for your efforts

Install:
Drop the esp file in your Skyrim Data folder

Load order:
Must be put in a lower order if used with mods that alter creature/NPC stats and levelled list
* Use of bashed patch is recommended but not required (bash tag this mod as Relev)

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/41354-1-1377928197.jpg[/img]
author: pablopikachu
